record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3120
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 3120 -- (House of Representatives - January 22, 2008)

[Page: H370]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that my cosponsorship of the bill, H.R. 3120, be withdrawn.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Florida?
